textJp: ビニ本の墨塗りの消し方でも知りたいのか？
ちなみにバターを塗ると消えるというのはまったくの迷信だぞ。
もちろん砂ケシも迷信だ。」
textEn: Wanna know how to remove the censor bars in porn magazines?
By the way, don't believe what you hear about butter doing the trick—total superstition.
You can't use an eraser, either."

textJp: 年に２回ほど、東京の有明大展覧会に出展されてるそうじゃないですか。
……覚醒剤常用の異常者に、バットか何かで殴り殺されて。
……聞いた話では、興宮辺りの愛人宅に転がり込んでるとか。」
textEn: His works go on display twice a year in the Great Ariake Exhibition in Tokyo, don't they?
...She was beaten to death with a baseball bat by a drug addict.
...From what I've heard, he's staying with a lover somewhere in Okinomiya."
